result.name: mnemiopsis-ecology-modelling-and-observation-memo-plankton-surveys
result.notes:
Analysis of samples collected for fish larvae and fish eggs, microzooplankton 
and mesozooplankton and phytoplankton. This data consists of the numbers of 
these plankton, along with associated positional data and volumes filtered 
where applicable.

CEFAS Cruises:

RV Endeavour 05/2011- Western English Channel (ICES area VIIE)RV Endeavour 
05/2012 - Western English Channel (ICES area VIIE)RV Endeavour 07/2012 - 
North Sea (Botney Gut/Silver Pit)RV Endeavour 7X/2012 - North Sea

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Mnemiopsis Ecology Modelling and Observation (MEMO) Plankton Surveys

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: CSV, ESRI Shapefile. The data can also be accessed via the WFS and WMS protocols.
resources.name: Cefas Data Portal
